## PageTemplate type

Represents a Page Template: a template used to render a Page.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PageTemplate = Template & {
    ApprovalStatus?: Link;
    FileExtension?: string;
    PageSchema?: Link;
    WorkflowInfo?: WorkflowInfo;
};
```
